root: ^Reginald` This is all so bizarre, isn't it?

c-0: ^Reginald` But oddly enough, this feels right.
^I'm glad. You don't have to relive your murder over and over again.
^Reginald` Heh. "Relive." That's a funny word. At any rate, I think things will be okay from here.
^Reginald` I might not remember anything that happened that day I was murdered, but thank you for all your help.
^Reginald` If I was going to die... I'm glad I won't anymore.
^I'm glad, too. Just keep an eye on Jake.
^Reginald` Right, the one that murdered me. I don't think they'll be able to arrest him, but I'll at least get him banned from here.
^Reginald` So if he comes back, we can actually arrest him. Not for murder, but for trespassing. Still good enough.
^Yeah, how do you feel about being murdered by your friend?
^Reginald` Very odd. Especially since I don't remember any of it.
^Reginald` But I'm alive now, and I wish to stay that way.
^Reginald` You know, you should come back again sometime. When there's a little less murder.
^Reginald` I'll give you a lifelong free pass.
^Reginald` No problem. The carnival should be a fun place for everyone.
^Reginald` I regret that it was anything less than that for you.
